description:
The Sole Performance Medium Cork Footbeds are a pair of insoles that are designed to provide comfort, support, and sustainability for your feet. They are made of recycled wine corks that are collected by ReCORK, a natural cork recycling program.

  • They have a metatarsal pad that helps relieve pressure and pain from the ball of the foot
  • They are heat and wear moldable, which means they can adapt to the shape of your foot over time
  • They are also coated with Polygiene, a recycled silver salt treatment that prevents odor-causing bacteria from growing on the insoles
name: Sole Performance Medium Cork Footbeds - Unisex
